name: kinfolk magazine vol. 9
description:
Kinfolk is perfect Sunday afternoon reading, 100+ beautifully designed pages of inspirational places, people, recipes and thoughts on simple living, done well.

The ninth issue of Kinfolk is all about defining your weekend, finding the right balance between work and play and making the most of your days off.

My favourites from this issue are an interview with James and Jessica Seaton, founders of Toast UK, a story for those of us that tend to work all weekend (ahem) and recipes and a look at the Kinfolk Table book to be released this month.

name: linen thread spool
description:
This linen thread with it's perfect wooden spool was the product that began my love of Fog Linen, and it is as beautiful to use as it is to look at.

The thread is 3ply, so it is thick for a thread. The colour is a medium natural linen grey, which could also be described as a silver tone. Each spool holds 100 meters of thread.

100% linen made in Lithuania.

name: kraft paper envelopes
description: I have searched far and wide to bring the perfect kraft brown paper envelopes to Supply Paper Co. Simple and utilitarian, but still just a little bit special. These envelopes have a crisp straight flap. Pack of 10 tied up with string. Small - 3.625 x 5.125" (130 x 92mm) Medium - 4.375 x 5.75" (146 x 112mm) Large - 5.25 x 7.25" (184 x 133mm) X-Large - 5.75 x 8.75" (146 x 222mm) Square - 5.5 x 5.5" (140 x 140mm) Please note: measurements may vary slightly.

name: made to measure sampler
description:
The best way to see and feel the quality of our Made to Measure paper goods is to hold it in your own hands.

Our sampler bag is filled with a selection of what's in the studio from our Made to Measure letterpress paper goods, as well as samples of our rubber stamps, envelopes and thread, string and twine.

name: oversized linen ball - 4mm
description:
An oversized linen ball in a rustic, natural brown. Made in France, these remind me of the kind of thing you'd expect to find on the shelves of a traditional general store or atelier.

The ball weighs 1kg, you need two hands to hold it, so plenty of string for wrapping parcels. I've got two of these sitting on my table in the studio, to go with brown paper packages.

Two widths available, 2mm or chunky 4mm.

name: cotton paper stock
description:
The house paper stock I have chosen for Supply Paper Co. is beautiful 100% cotton paper. Soft, tactile and thick. Match these up with our cotton or kraft envelopes, rubber stamps and thread, string or twine.

Our cotton comes in two paper whites, pure white - a bright, crisp white, and natural white - a more ecru, slightly creamy white. Weight is 300gsm.

Pack of 10 sheets.

Small - 3.5 x 5" (127 x 89mm)
Medium - 4.25 x 5.5" (108 x 140mm)
Large - 5 x 7" (127 x 178mm)
Square - 5 x 5" (127 x 127mm)
Small folded card - 3.5 x 5" (127 x 89mm)

name: hemp twine ball
description:
100% natural hemp twine in natural or black made in Eastern Europe. This could be my new favourite twine, it looks so beautiful against kraft or ecru paper.  

123 meters in each ball.

name: kraft paper tube
description:
I looked high and low to bring these kraft paper tubes to Supply Paper Co. I originally used these to mail paper goods (and they all arrived in perfect condition, hooray!), but they are so beautiful they could be used for so many things.

Each tube has crimped lid ends, the bottom is glued, the top lid is removable. 

Measures 114mm height x 89mm diameter.

name: custom rubber stamp - square
description: Old fashioned, beautifully crafted and so satisfying to use - to me rubber stamps are an essential and wonderfully traditional tool with so many applications. Our stamps are made from traditional red rubber, laser cut for a detailed impression, and mounted on a hard maple wood block. Your stamp is engraved into the wood back, and you can choose to add a beautiful black wooden handle to medium and large stamp sizes. Custom stamps are for using your own logo or artwork - once we've received your order we will email you for your file/s. Small - 1.5 x 1.5" Medium - 2 x 2" Large - 3 x 3" Please allow 10-15 working days for custom stamp orders.

name: kinfolk magazine vol. 8
description:
Kinfolk is perfect Sunday afternoon reading, 100+ beautifully designed pages of inspirational places, people, recipes and thoughts on simple living, done well.

I can't tell you how excited I am about this issue, celebrating one of my favourite places in the world, Japan, and featuring Yumiko Sekine and Fog Linen (our current limited collection). Other favourite stories are instructions for making paper origami cherry blossoms, Japanese words to live by and a recipe for cherry blossom macarons with black sesame.

name: zinc square peg label
description:
These are just like the zinc signs I saw labeling breads and cheeses in the traditional French markets of Provence, simple, functional and beautiful. 

Made in France, the zinc metal has a beautiful grey chalky finish, for writing with chalk (or white ink if you'd like the lettering to be more permanent). There is a natural wooden peg on the back so you can attach these wherever you'd like. 

Measures 6 x 6cm

name: kraft storage box
description: Old world atelier kraft storage box with a half moon finger cut holed lid. Simple and classic. I use mine for storing all kinds of ephemera in the studio, with labels hand written in white ink. Each box with lid measures 10.25" x 7.25" x 3.25". If you'd like to order a large quantity of these boxes we also offer a wholesale carton price for orders of 30. Please email hello@supplypaperco.com to order.

name: cotton paper envelopes
description:
For me it's always more rewarding to do the simplest things with the most care and thought as you can. As far as envelopes go, you can't get more simple than the humble white envelope. But make those envelopes with soft, tactile 100% cotton paper and they become something beautiful.

These envelopes come in two paper whites, pure white - a bright, crisp white, and natural white - a more ecru, slightly creamy white. Finished with a crisp straight flap. 

Pack of 10. 

Small - 3.625 x 5.125" (130 x 92mm)
Medium - 4.375 x 5.75" (146 x 112mm)
Large - 5.25 x 7.25" (184 x 133mm)

name: Hand drawn initial rubber stamp
description:
Your initial/s using hand drawn lettering, made into a rubber stamp monogram. 

Old fashioned, beautifully crafted and so satisfying to use - to me rubber stamps are an essential and wonderfully traditional tool with so many applications.

Our stamps are made from traditional red rubber, laser cut for a detailed impression, and mounted on a hard maple wood block. 

Once we've received your order we will email you for your initial/s.

Single letter measures 1 x 1"
Two letters measures 1.5 x 1.5"

name: wire mesh basket
description:
A wire mesh basket, handmade in Mexico from black iron. I love looking at these, the wire mesh has such a beautiful, almost sculptural quality.

A simple piece, useful for cut flowers, holding eggs or other sundries on the kitchen counter.

Measures 23cm (diameter) Ã— 21cm.

name: noah bell
description:
You really need to hear the sound of these bells to know how beautiful they are, the sound is so special.

Each noah bell is handmade from iron, copper and wood by a tiny community of 20 families in a single village in India. 

Traditionally used by shepherds to tend their flocks and to scare away evil spirits. 

Small measures 2.5cm (diameter) x 4cm. 
Large measures 5.5cm (diameter) x 9cm.

name: natural jute twine spool
description:
Perfect jute twine in a rustic natural, almost rattan, golden brown. 

This twine is strong and holds it's shape quite well. A little thinner than regular garden twine. 50 meters on each spool.

name: oversized jute twine spool
description:
Oversized jute twine spool in a rustic natural, almost straw coloured brown. 

This twine is strong and holds it's shape quite well. A little thinner than regular garden twine, with a slightly rustic finish.

I love this twine for wrapping parcels and tying bunches of flowers from the garden.

Each roll holds 520 meters.

name: custom rubber stamp - rectangle
description: Old fashioned, beautifully crafted and so satisfying to use - to me rubber stamps are an essential and wonderfully traditional tool with so many applications. Our stamps are made from traditional red rubber, laser cut for a detailed impression, and mounted on a hard maple wood block. Your stamp is engraved into the wood back, and you can choose to add a beautiful black wooden handle to medium and large stamp sizes. Custom stamps are for using your own logo or artwork - once we've received your order we will email you for your file/s. Small - 1.5 x 1.5" Medium - 3 x 1.5" Large - 3 x 5" Please allow 10-15 working days for custom stamp orders.

name: postal mark rubber stamp
description: Old fashioned, beautifully crafted and so satisfying to use - to me rubber stamps are an essential and wonderfully traditional tool with so many applications. Our stamps are made from traditional red rubber, laser cut for a detailed impression, and mounted on a hard maple wood block. The postal rubber stamp series is a homage to old postal marks seen on correspondence from around the world - choose from one of four designs. Once we've received your order we will email you for your wording. Stamp measures 1.5 x 1.5" Please allow 10-15 working days for rubber stamp orders.

name: oversized linen twine spool
description:
When you buy things from French ateliers, you really notice they take their time wrapping your purchase with care and thoughtfulness, and often in brown paper tied simply, and beautifully with string. 

Made in France, this 100% burnished linen twine on an oversized 1kg spool, is perfect for tying things as the French shopkeepers do.

The natural linen is light brown in colour, not as grey as our natural linen thread or tape, and has a slightly rustic finish.

The black linen is a rich black and has a slightly rustic finish.

900m spool, twine diameter 2mm.

name: natural linen pouch
description:
The perfect, simple and utilitarian linen pouch with zip. Made in Lithuania from a medium weight natural linen, which to me is a little more brown than grey in tone.

I use my small pouch for coins and keys and the larger pouch as a pencil case.

Small measures 15 x 10cm
Medium measures 28 x 21.5cm

name: slate memo board
description:
Old fashioned slate memo boards with talc writing block and heavy twine for hanging. 

I use mine for hanging on the door to let guests know we're around the back, or to remind myself what we've run out of in the kitchen (although I always forget again if I don't take a written list with me to the store).

Small (pictured) measures 20.8 (width) x 12cm

Medium measures 24.8 (width) x 20.5cm

N.B because slate is a natural product, each board will be slightly different in size and imperfections.

name: linen tape roll
description:
I've found just two of these rolls of linen tape from Latvia, in my favourite natural linen. The tape is lovely and thick and has a beautiful texture to the weave. 

I'm not exactly sure how many meters are on each roll, but hopefully the measurements below will help!

The tape itself is 15mm wide.

Small (pictured) - 45mm deep, 130mm diameter
Large - 60mm deep, 165mm diameter

name: zinc shipping label
description: These are just like the zinc signs I saw labeling breads and cheeses in the traditional French markets of Provence, simple, functional and beautiful. Made in France, the zinc metal has a beautiful grey chalky finish, for writing with chalk (or white ink if you'd like the lettering to be more permanent). Each label is individually hand strung with natural linen string. Small measures 2x4cm Large measures 5 x 8.5cm Larger quantities can be ordered for table settings - these make a lovely gift for guests to keep as well.

name: cotton string ball
description:
The classic natural white cotton string. I love this string for finishing off gift wrapping and tying bunches of herbs in the kitchen. A little collection of these sit under a cloche on my desk in the studio.

The string is what I would call a medium thickness, if thread was thin and garden twine was thick. 25 meters to a ball.

name: kinfolk magazine vol. 6
description:
Kinfolk is perfect Sunday afternoon reading, 100+ beautifully designed pages of inspirational places, people, recipes and thoughts on simple living, done well.

Volume 6 is all about traditions. My favourites from this issue are a story about Mast Brothers staff lunches, another about the history of breakfast and a recipe for champurrado (like a Mexican hot chocolate).

name: fÃªte winter 13
description:
FÃªte is an Australian journal that celebrates family, friends, living and entertaining in a way that is simple, real and beautiful.

This issue is pretty special to me, you might see our little home amongst the pages!

name: kinfolk magazine vol. 7
description:
Kinfolk is perfect Sunday afternoon reading, 100+ beautifully designed pages of inspirational places, people, recipes and thoughts on simple living, done well.

Volume 7 is inspired by the humble treat - ice cream. My favourites from this issue are the Kinfolk dinners from LA, Toronto and Paris, a sea-salted lemon ice cream recipe and a story about Spring traditions.

name: made to measure no. one
description:
// To Order

Email to order or download our guide for price list and order form

// Printing


Letterpress or flat print

// Paper


Pure or natural white cotton

// Ink


Charcoal, faded black, silver, french grey, navy or ecru

// Envelope


Pure or natural white, kraft brown - blank or with addresses printed.

name: linen handle market bag
description:
A basic market bag, the larger bag is perfect for groceries on it's own, or the smaller bag for sitting inside a market basket to keep herbs or smaller groceries separate so you don't need to use the store's plastic bags. I use mine both ways and find them strong and lasting.

Made in Lithuania from polypropylene with grey and white striped linen handles. 

The small measures 25 (width) x  33cm, large measures 54 (width) x 53cm.
